how: I'm trying to install Ubuntu on my laptop but when it detects hardware it freezes at 86% were it loads module "ide-cd" for "Linux ATAPI CD-ROM". any help?
eyah i got it installed.. try this..:
turn on all the debugging.. its on one of the pages, two settings
then run your install in expert mode
and disable the last 5 or so options, and it will detect your cdrom drive as a floppy
at least, that's what it did for me
how do i turn on all debugging
use your fKeys (f1-f8) they display information about varibles you can pass on to the boot loader.
one of those has a page that will tell you
i skipped the the cdrom checl but it now asks for a module and device?
